body: Goddamn, the first story is good. That waist tattoo and navel pierce is so hot.
I got redirected here from Momozumi Jun's first part, check it out here: https://nhentai.net/g/388661/

Tamabi got the first story, good to see he's getting some recognition. His art is god-tier!
Or it the printing order is chosen at random by editors and it doesn't matter at all. Either way, he's still great.
Author for the story with the blind girl is Betty

@below: I disagree. I see why you can't find anything good here cuz you either got blue balls or just got 'em empty cuz you keep doing the loser's NNN (Non-stop Nut November). When you fap too much, you eventually grow tired. Try watching 10 hrs straight of porn, I betcha you can't even find any interest by the 3rd hour. How do I enjoy this? I very, very rarely use hentai as fap material, more so for a good read of entertainment, and mostly for the art as the daily dose of sugar to my eyes.
